names and look them up in a hardcoded directory.  I generalized it to take lists
of (directory, name) pairs, but I didn't realize it had external callers.

author: theo.zimmermann@inria.fr
message: Add workflow for building and uploading PDF. (#2)
body:
* Add workflow for building and uploading PDF.

Only updates the PDF on GitHub Pages when running in branch master.

When on pull requests or other branches, the PDF is still built and
made available as an artifact to ease reviewing.

* Make mkdir step future-proof.

 "induction (Nat.eq_dec m n)" aren't equivalent:
 eq_nat_dec is just a compatibility notation for Nat.eq_dec ?!

author: herbelin@0cf17b13-060f-0410-b1b1-c666bec9822a
message: Taking into account the restriction on referring to constant of a section which depends on section variables which have been cleared in the current goal. See commit cad44fcfe8a129af24d4d9d1f86c8be123707744 and bug #2996. In folLogic3.v, the alternative solution giving qualified names to section variables would have allowed not to clear the faulty hypothesis.

author: pboutill@0cf17b13-060f-0410-b1b1-c666bec9822a
message: Goedel contrib takes disavantages of maximal insertion of implicits arguments.

author: pboutill@0cf17b13-060f-0410-b1b1-c666bec9822a
body:
Easy part:
"vector " -> "Vector.t "
"Vconst " -> "Vector.const "
"Vhead " -> "Vector.hd " & "Vtail " -> "Vector.tl "
"Vcons " -> "Vector.cons " & "Vnil" -> Vector.nil"

More annoying one:
Arguments of Vector.cons are "h" and "t" instead of "a" and "v".

git-svn-id: svn://scm.gforge.inria.fr/svnroot/coq-contribs/trunk@1313 0cf17b13-060f-0410-b1b1-c666bec9822a

author: herbelin@0cf17b13-060f-0410-b1b1-c666bec9822a
message: Adapted contributions to new policy for automatic introduction of variables preceding the colon in Definition, Lemma, etc. This helped to fine-tune the exact behavior of the new policy. Used option "Automatic Introduction" for ssreflect only.

author: herbelin@0cf17b13-060f-0410-b1b1-c666bec9822a
message: Conséquences de l'insertion de unfold dans apply. Les "repeat apply" se comportent parfois différemment. Parfois trop difficile de trouver une alternative autre que d'utiliser la version "simple apply", tant pis.

author: roconnor@0cf17b13-060f-0410-b1b1-c666bec9822a
body:
Added a small segement of the proof of the 2nd incompeleteness theorem.

Removed requirement that the language be decidable for the deduction theorem.
